title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The line 'static Callback callback = new Callback (BidiUtil.class, "windowProc", 4);' in org.eclipse.swt.internal.BidiUtil is causing a NoClassDefFoundError.
EB: The BidiUtil class should have a private constructor to prevent instantiation since there are no nonstatic methods in the class.
SR: To reproduce the issue, verify or use jxeLink or some other verification tool. The NoClassDefFoundError should be seen when relying on the CLDC version of SWT.
